about.title: About Me
about.description: Backend developer passionate about .NET technologies. I love creating robust APIs and scalable solutions that solve real-world problems.
about.longDescription:
I am a backend developer experienced in .NET and C#, focused on scalable APIs, microservices, and integrations with both relational and non-relational databases.

I have contributed to large corporate projects, including Bradesco P2 at Invillia and Client Portal at GAV Resorts. Additionally, I work on personal and freelance solutions, including clinic management systems and e-commerce platforms with WordPress/WooCommerce.

My skill set includes modern DevOps practices (Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions), messaging systems (Apache Kafka), and observability tools (Grafana, Serilog). I am committed to combining technical quality, team organization, and a strong focus on delivering real value to end users.
